page.title: 11HUMBERSTON LOCAL HEALTH.
page.content: There are many local health facilities in the village of Humberston. It is possible to take care of one's health throughout life, from before birth to old age. There is a Health Clinic in the grounds of the Infant and Junior Schools. Antenatal classes are held at the clinic. Doctors and Health Visitors hold Baby Care Clinics, where babies are weighed and examined and where expert advice can be obtained. Older children have a School Medical examination at the clinic. Vaccinations are carried out too. The school dentist visits the school with a mobile surgery. The school nurse visits the school regularly. There are 2 doctors' surgeries locally. There is a dentists' surgery. There are 2 old peoples homes and a group dwelling with a warden.
